attributes.action: United Kingdom need to close all its boarders.
attributes.additional_details: The government are not doing enough to curtail the spread of the Coronavirus, in my opinion the country needs to go into complete lockdown, as is the case with numerous nations across the globe.
attributes.background: The government need to close all boarders to prevent the populace being exposed to foreign bodies entering our shores in the event they could be infected with the Coronavirus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
